thread.title: Stories you WON'T find in a Valentine's card
thread.title_full: Stories you WON'T find in a Valentine's card

title: Stories you WON'T find in a Valentine's card
text: The women who've had husbands and boyfriends but NEVER BEEN IN LOVE: Courageous and rarely told, stories you WON'T find in a Valentine's card Christine Corbett, 48, said she was never in love with her husband of 21 years Like Christine, Angelique Saint-Martin, who lives in Essex, never dreamed she'd reach middle age without ever having lost her heart to anyone Michelle Lewis, a lettings operations manager from Cardiff, is sad to admit that she has no idea how it feels to fall in love â€” even though she was once engaged
